page.title: 10RECREATION - HOLBERROW GREEN
page.content:
Charity work for the disabled forms the only recreation for one couple who have adapted both their home and garden for ease of access for approximately 5000 visitors per year. These two people never have a holiday as their one acre garden requires constant attention as well as the many avaries and birds they look after.
Apart from walking and gardening all other recreational activities take place outside the area. Squash, badminton, swimming, football and tennis are enjoyed. The facilities for these are to be found in both the nearby village of Inkberrow and further afield in Redditch and surrounding large towns.
The farming families have little time to take part in recreation.
